events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking number isn't updating, and I'm worried about the shipping delay.
System has categorized this case under 'Delivery Delay' based on keywords like 'delay' and 'shipping delay' found in the customer's initial message.
The support case for the delayed shipment has been assigned to shipping specialist Maria J. for follow-up and resolution.
Hello! I’m Maria from customer support. I understand your order is delayed and I’m here to help you get this sorted out as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can track the package in our system and find out what caused the delay?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and the shipping address is 789 Elm Street, Apartment 2B, Springfield, IL. Please let me know what you find.

Thank you for the details. After checking, your package was delayed due to a transit issue but is now back on track and should arrive within three business days. We also offered expedited shipping on your next order.
Thanks for the update! I appreciate the expedited shipping offer on my next purchase. That makes me feel better about this delay.
Great! I’m glad we could clarify the situation. Your order is on its way, and we’ve applied a discount for expedited delivery on your next purchase.
Just checking in to confirm that your order has arrived. Please let us know if everything is in order or if you need any further assistance.
Since no further issues have been reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience, and we look forward to serving you again.
A short satisfaction survey has been sent to you via email to collect your feedback on your recent support experience.
